name: ext-decimal-rs
description: Fixed-point decimal utilities (codec_v1, parse, format, basic ops).
docs:
Fixed-point decimal utilities (codec_v1, parse, format, basic ops).

Modules:
- std.math.decimal
- std.math.decimal.codec_v1
- std.math.decimal.parse
- std.math.decimal.fmt
- std.math.decimal.tests

Usage:
- Add dependency: x07 pkg add ext-decimal-rs@0.1.1 --sync
- Import the modules listed above.

Notes:
- Determinism: pure
- Representation: (sign, scale, magnitude)
- Encoding: std.math.decimal.codec_v1 (stable)
